official_title: To extend until January 1, 1995, the existing temporary suspension of duty on chlor amino base.

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to extend, through December 31, 1994, the existing suspension of duty on 4-chloro-2,5-dimethoxy aniline (also known as chlor amino base).

titles.title: To extend until January 1, 1995, the existing temporary suspension of duty on chlor amino base.
